markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Salamander Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=98)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elixir is made from salamander scales to withstand fire. For 24 hours, you are protected from the effects of severe heat.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Salamander Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Salamander Elixir (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You’re also protected from extreme heat.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Salamander Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 549 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You’re also protected from extreme and incredible heat.
name: Salamander Elixir
